```
FROM centos:7
RUN yum -y install wget 
RUN yum -y install unzip 
RUN yum -y install java-1.8.0-openjdk 
RUN yum clean all
ENV JAVA_HOME /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/
RUN export JAVA_HOME
```
